mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_handled ( transaction_id, amount, pay_mode, voucher, remark, create_user_id, create_time ) VALUE ( #{handledInfo.transactionId}, #{handledInfo.amount}, #{handledInfo.payMode}, #{handledInfo.voucher}, #{handledInfo.remark}, #{handledInfo.createUserId}, #{handledInfo.createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS `id`, transaction_id AS transactionId, amount, pay_mode AS payMode, voucher, remark, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_time AS createTime FROM transaction_handled WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId}
